dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
Geoffrey Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR-10 dataset consists of 60k training and 10k test images from 10 classes; airplane, automobile, bird, cat, deer, dog, frog, horse, ship and truck.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: Yann LeCun
dcterms:description: MNIST dataset consists of 28 Ã— 28 1-channel images of handwritten digits from 0 to 9. The dataset contains 60k training and a test set of 10k examples.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Han Xiao
Kashif Rasul
Roland Vollgraf
dcterms:description: Fashion-MNIST dataset consists of 60k training and 5k testing images where each sample belongs to one of ten classes of fashion items such as shoes, clothes and hats.
dcterms:title: Fashion-MNIST

dcterms:creator: Yuval Netzer
Tao Wang
Adam Coates
Alessandro Bissacco
Bo Wu
Andrew Y Ng
dcterms:description: SVHN dataset consists of colored images of house numbers where it contains 73k and 26k samples for training and testing respectively.
dcterms:title: Street View House Numbers (SVHN)
